legal_basis: PRRA decisions are reviewed for reasonableness
procedural fairness is assessed under correctness standard
evidence_assessment: officer dismissed key incidents (2009 attacks) without sufficient analysis
procedural_fairness: veiled credibility determination without an oral hearing
decision_reasoning: errors in evidence handling and procedural fairness, leading to unreasonable state protection conclusions
result_of_case: application for judicial review is granted, and the matter is referred back for redetermination
